Warning.title: Warning: Advanced Settings
Warning.body: These settings should only be edited by trained personnel. Incorrect settings can cause SimpleVolumeControl to stop working properly.

PasswordConfig.disclaimer1: The password doesn't provide a secure access control, especially when not using HTTPS. Instead, it just offers protection against accidental use. Malicious Actors can overcome this protection. Because of this, it is imperative to only use SimpleVolumeControl in secure local networks, that can only be accessed by trustworthy parties.
PasswordConfig.disclaimer2: Basic measures are in place to make it more difficult for a read-only attacker to draw conclusions about the used password. Nevertheless, the password used for SimpleVolumeControl should not be used for any other service.

Keyboard.default2: '{tab'} q w e r t y u i o p [ ] \
Keyboard.default3: '{lock'} a s d f g h j k l ; ' '{enter'}
Keyboard.default4: '{shift'} z x c v b n m , . / '{shift'}
Keyboard.shift2: '{tab'} Q W E R T Y U I O P '{ '} |
Keyboard.shift3: '{lock'} A S D F G H J K L : " '{enter'}
Keyboard.shift4: '{shift'} Z X C V B N M < > ? '{shift'}
